Raphaël is figuring things out

This is my personal lab. I like exploring smart tools, tweaking product workflows, and building small things that save time or remove friction. I'm not a developer — but I often end up writing a bit of code, testing setups, and breaking stuff to understand how it all works.

This blog is where I document that journey. It's messy, real, and 100% hands-on.
